column4: What do I open a .run file with? (It is drivers for my video card)
what card?  Why aren't you using the Hardware Drivers tool in the Administration menu?
ATI X1650. Hardware drivers tool (assuming I am doing it right) basically makes my monitor resolution go out of range and I get a black screen
I don't know much about ati issues.  Does the wiki offer no troubleshooting advice?
